players %>%
  filter(name %in% titles3) %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  mutate(
    start = min(date),
    Year = year(date)) %>%
  group_by(name, Year, tourney_name) %>%
  summarize(
    points = sum(points),
    start = min(start)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange(start, name, tourney_name) %>%
  select(-start) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = Year, values_from = points, values_fill = NA) %>%
  rename(
    Player = name,
    Tournament = tourney_name) %>%
  mutate(
    Tournament = recode(Tournament, "Roland Garros" = "French", "Australian Open" = "Australian")) %>%
  unnest() %>%
  flextable() %>%
  align(align = "center", part = "all") %>%
  theme_apa() %>%
  bg(
    bg = colourer,
    j = ~ . -Player -Tournament,
    part = "body") %>%
  merge_v(j = ~Player) %>%
  width(j = 2, width = 1.5) %>%
  colformat_double(digits = 0)
